name: clean-architecture-api
description: Clean Architecture API with .NET Core, PostgreSQL, and Docker

scripts.docker:restart: dotnet ef database update --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API
scripts.db:migrate: dotnet ef database update --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production dotnet ef database update --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API
scripts.db:drop: dotnet ef database drop --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API --force
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:truncate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup: npm run restore && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate
scripts.setup:prod: npm run restore && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate:prod
scripts.reset: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate

author: Clean Architecture Team
